response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its true worth lies in finding the right person who appreciates it fully. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to you. I kindly propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. I believe this price reflects its true value while also providing you with a significant advantage compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to share this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 9500}
